phrases: The Master was as cute as always today...
She truly is an angel from Heaven.
Oh, and the folks will be visiting Mom's hometown over the weekend.
As of tomorrow, it will be just the two of us.
You want to get some food delivered?
When I go back home today,
it will just be me and my brother!
What is so bad about that?
Our house is Hell as it is, but now it will be Hades!
How is Hades different from Hell...?
Hey, you should just stay here tonight!
I will have to ask my brother, though.
I guess I will head over to Bomba's place later.
I am sure he will be lonely without you around.
Yeah, he would mentioned it at the Enoshima aquarium.
Well, guess I will make dinner.
It was quite filling, was not it?
Well, I am going to Bomba's.
You would rather I not say anything?
I get the feeling he would be worried otherwise...
Master... your brother is kind, is not he?
It sort of reminds me of Ebina.
Kirie, let us play a game!
It feels a little strange being under someone else's roof...
Well, what is YOUR house like?
It is pretty old and rundown.
You are so late, that I was worried you would gotten lost!
I-I took the long way home.
Th-the Master is calling out to me while she is dreaming!
Do not tell me she is formed a bond with my storybook!
Kirie, you are going to fall.
Well then, Master, I will be on my way.
That Kirie, I am tellin' you...
Up until the start of elementary school, she would be all like, Big Brother!
She is gone off and made some great friends, like Tanukichi and Ebina, and I... I...
My, my... reading manga indoors on a hot day with the AC blasting sure is great, huh, Kirie?
And I bet it will follow the standard pattern of him not hearing over the sound of the train!
It is kind of vexing, but you want to root for them because a romantic comedy needs a happy ending, huh?
Kirie, what is got you yelling all of a sudden?
Th-that vision just now was my dark side... and that was something I would have said up till recently!
It looks like those two are a couple now!
So, for our next girls' day out...
What kind of boy would you like to...?
She is got a great bod, and she is smart too.
That is MISS Umaru to you, punk!
Kirie, what is got you crouching all of a sudden?
I did not want to admit that I just cannot get used to being part of a community.
All I would ever do is despise the people around me.
I have... made an enemy I must defeat.
She sure gets emotionally involved with her manga...
You do not have to get that worked up about it, you know.
Kirie wants to be a storybook author, so maybe that is why she is taking this manga so personally.
In that case, I must give her a definitive answer, as her Master!
There is no need to overthink this.
you should just believe in what you want to believe!
You are in your school uniform...
There is something that I would ask you!
You like Taihei Doma, do not you?
It was obvious from your reactions the other day.
That is what I wish to discuss with you.
I have decided on something this day...
You want to root for them because a romantic comedy needs a happy ending, huh?
I shall root for your love with all my strength!
You should just believe in what you want to believe!
And what I believe in... is my Master.
She is kind and smart, and graced with many talents.
She is loved by young and old, men and women.
She is flawless, the perfect high school girl.
Well... that is what everyone seems to think.
This is Umaru when she is at home.
My lazy, dried fish of a sister... a himouto.
Now look here, Umaru: summer vacation is not just for lazing around!
It is a time for you to do and experience things you do not usually have the chance to at school.
Do not you worry, Big Brother.
I may not look it, but I have changed.
I always read Jumpu, but today I got Jumpu SQUARE!
Still, I am not so sure what Square is supposed to mean...
I have to at least get her outside!
There is a fireworks festival today!
There will be lots of big, beautiful fireworks!
The first thing is to try to get her to an event that she would like.
There is too many people, and insects, and it will be hot.
Man, I was thinking we could buy some food from the stalls there...
I am not buying all that!
This is no time for sitting around!
Do not sweat the small stuff.
She really is a different person outside...
Oh, so she wanted to go with her friends?
You invite Taihei to the fireworks festival.
That will create just the right mood.
It is great, is not it, Ebina?
We have already been to the beach together, right?
What do you say we all go to the fireworks festival?
Now we can all go together!
You do not want to go yet?
There are preparations to be made!
A fireworks festival means one must wear a summer kimono!
You still have a lot to learn, Big Brother.
What can I get you all?
No, I can pay for myself.
You do not have to worry about that today.
Okay, let us sit here and watch.
This is an especially large star mine, indeed!
They sure make a lot of sound, huh?
I may not look it, but I have changed.
My younger sister is a himouto, but...
while some things do not change, little by little, some things do.
It is time to go to school.
Do you have the day off today?
Yeah, to make up for lost vacation time.
Are you going to go somewhere?
Hmm... to go buy groceries, I guess.
And we shall all eat together!
Oh, Umaru, the teacher was looking for you earlier.
To give you your certificate from that awards ceremony.
It always takes a while to actually get your award, huh?
It is been on display in front of the staff office this whole time.
I heard that the last time two people got awards at the same time was 10 years ago!
That might have been my brother.
Apparently, he always had the top grades in his school year.
This brother and sister have some impressive specs!
Maybe I will make cream stew today.
After all, he is SO kind-hearted!
He brought souvenirs and bought us so many things at the festival!
What is more, he is kind and makes you feel at ease somehow.
No, Ebina, I was just thinking, I would like a brother like that!
I have to go to the principal's office, so you all go on ahead.
Taihei Doma sure was something else.
Taihei the Demon, they called him.
Takes you back, does not it?
And makes you feel at ease somehow.
Looks like he is just come back from shopping.
I will scare him from behind!
This is sure to give him a shock!
Um, I think you have got the wrong person...
I feel like I have seen this girl somewhere before...
That is it, at the awards ceremony.
She is the girl from the AP class.
She is a friend of yours, huh?
W-well, we go to the same school but I would not say we are friends...
I do not like the outdoors...
YOU-um, your name is Kongo, is not it?
This is the first time we have talked, is not it?
There is no need to keep up appearances, so just lounge around as always.
I have never even talked to her before, but she is fixated on Big Brother...
Big Brother is MY big brother.
I do feel like I know her from somewhere...
There is no way a little girl like this could eat THREE of them.
You are Kanau's younger sister, are not you?
You remember that girl from when we went to Hamamatsu?
And Hikari is her younger sister.
It is been a REALLY long time since I have seen her, but I remember now.
No, no, no, no, no no no!
Well, I will be leaving now.
Do you want me to walk you back?
I have got some cream stew that will be ready soon...
I-I will come back again sometime.
Say hi to Kanau for me.
Why does she call you Big Brother?
I am not sure... she did used to call me that, though.
Why did she suddenly show up today?
To hang out with you, right?
I have never hung out with her!
It had been so long since I would seen my big brother and we were able to talk.
Like I said, he is MY big brother!
If you are determined to call him that, though, then you can call me Big Sis!
